course.subject: HUMA
course.name: History of P. R. China's Diplomacy, 1949-1989
course.description: This course will introduce to students the diplomatic history of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1989, focusing on Sino-USSR and Sino-U.S. relations in the context of the Cold War. Key events and leading figures will be covered, newly declassified archival materials will be presented, and critical examination and rethinking of PRC history will be introduced for discussion.

reviews.author: FDR
reviews.comment_content: Very well-designed syllabus and covers many of the important events and details throughout the Chinese diplomatic history. Systematic as well as it goes from early ROC era to the PRC.
reviews.comment_teaching:
A relatively objective teaching method as the professor encourages students to be open-minded.

The professor is relatively serious in teaching, but for a good reason.
reviews.comment_grading: Grading is fine in my opinion. Did most of my designated work and got into A range.
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is quite heavy. Expect to allocate at least 2-3 hours doing all the readings and reviews each month.

1 reading/book review each week along with 2 essays in total.

Hard work does pay off though. Readings are well-selected and are relatively informative.

reviews.author: Tina Du
reviews.title: Inspiring！
reviews.comment_content: 中國近代外交史，由清末講到六四事件。涉及諸多大陸不輕易被提及的歷史事件。通過閱讀諸多史料，並參考美蘇等多個國家重新探討抗日戰爭，國共內戰，新中國成立後的歷史中的重大事件，同時探究時代大背景下小人物的命運變遷。
reviews.comment_teaching: 老師超級nice，普通話授課邏輯清晰而且會侃一些時事熱點，每次的複習預習材料都十分地詳實認真，會教授一些講故事的方法，一些學習的方法以及獨立思考的方法。可以約飯聊天聽他講和龍應台齊邦媛等知名作家以及與退役老兵的往來非常有趣。
reviews.comment_grading:
好好讀書不至於爛龜，但也很難好龜。
可以通過口述訪問和做視頻加分，不過都比較花心思。

reviews.author: lex
reviews.comment_content: About the history of PRC's diplomacy, also include history before PRC was established.
reviews.comment_teaching: The teacher always gave vivid lectures. Although there was no attendance, attending the class was important because most of the things are taught in class instead of in lecture notes.
reviews.comment_grading: The grading is fair I have to say. If you have attended most of the classes,  read most of the materials and put some effort into it, you can get A range.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is a little bit heavy. The course required us to read two books in Chinese and one book in English. And also there were other reading metarials every week.

reviews.author: CH Lee
reviews.comment_content:
雖然呢個course係話教1949-1989既外交史，但實際既課程係會由於1842既鴉片戰爭開始教起，去到1989六四事件為止，另外會有兩堂教香港冷戰時期既外交史。

Mid-term前：主要會教由清朝末年到民國期間唔同既外交事件，主要的部分會係抗日戰爭至國共內戰時期(1941-1949)，亦都係Midterm exam 主要會考既部分。

Mid-term後：開始會講中華人民共和國外交史韓戰、金門導彈危機、中蘇關係、中美關係、台海兩岸關係等。

Reading Materials： 3本required texts＋每星期幾十版既reading
reviews.comment_teaching: 呢個course係用普通話上堂，所以上堂都會比較輕鬆D，不過佢講野比較細聲，要專心少少先聽得到佢講咩。同埋常教授喺每一堂既頭半個鐘會講下時事或者播下片咁，同學生傾下計，之後先會用剩低既一個鐘講Powerpoint教書。
reviews.comment_grading:
Attendance & Pop quizzes：20%
Timeline：10%
Mid-term： 30%
Final examination：40%
Extra Credit: Oral History interview, timeline, and report: 3%

Quiz會用iPRS做，一個sem大概有5次左右，有quiz既前一日會send email提學生，唔使驚上堂突擊俾quiz，而attendance就係用果幾次quiz計分）

Timeline完sem時交一份，佢會俾sample你睇，但一定要加少少reading materials 作者對史事既評論落timeline先會滿分

Midterm 有MC,地圖題, photo identification, keyword identification同一條essay

Final 模式同midterm一樣，不過多一條essay

考Midterm 同Final之前會upload一份review上canvas，裡面會俾兩條essay sample做準備（Final就俾3條essay sample），考試會一模一樣照出番。

Midterm 踩mean, timeline 滿分, quiz同final無出分，最後B
reviews.comment_workload:
Workload 唔大，主要係midterm, final 同一份timeline assignments.
如果想喺exam 既essay裡面用到required materials 既point，先需要睇多D reading materials。
